description.english: The Sun Cult is victorious.
description.german: Der Sonnenkult siegt.
description.french: Le Culte du soleil est victorieux.
description.italian: La Setta del Sole è vittoriosa.
description.spanish: El Culto del Sol sale victorioso.
description.brazilian: A Seita do Sol é vitoriosa.

description.english: Defeat the Sun Cult.
description.german: Besiege den Sonnenkult.
description.french: Vaincs le Culte du soleil.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Setta del Sole.
description.spanish: Derrota al Culto del Sol.
description.russian: Вы одержали победу над Культом Солнца.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Seita do Sol.

description.english: Submit to the Sun Cult's ultimate weapon.
description.german: Unterwirf dich der ultimativen Waffe des Sonnenkults.
description.french: Soumets-toi à l'arme suprême du Culte du Soleil.
description.italian: Arrenditi all’arma finale della Setta del Sole.
description.spanish: Ríndete ante el arma definitiva del Culto del Sol.
description.russian: Склонитесь перед главным орудием Культа Солнца.
description.brazilian: Submeta-se à arma poderosa da Seita do Sol.

description.english: Destroy the Sun Cult's ultimate weapon.
description.german: Vernichte die ultimative Waffe des Sonnenkults.
description.french: Détruis l'arme suprême du Culte du soleil.
description.italian: Distruggi l’arma finale della Setta del Sole.
description.spanish: Destruye el arma definitiva del Culto del Sol.
description.brazilian: Destrua à arma poderosa da Seita do Sol.

description.english: Refuse a direct order from Issar.
description.german: Verweigere einen direkten Befehl von Issar.
description.french: Refuse un ordre direct d'Issar.
description.italian: Rifiuta un ordine diretto di Issar.
description.spanish: Rechaza una orden directa de Issar.
description.brazilian: Recuse uma ordem direta de Issar.

description.english: Re-enact the ancient rituals.
description.german: Führe die alten Rituale aus.
description.french: Revis les rituels anciens.
description.italian: Rimetti in atto gli antichi rituali.
description.spanish: Recrea los antiguos rituales.
description.brazilian: Refaça os antigos rituais.

description.english: Seduce the King.
description.german: Verführe den König.
description.french: Séduis le roi.
description.italian: Seduci il Re.
description.spanish: Seduce al Rey.
description.brazilian: Seduza o Rei.

description.english: Win in a battle against your own brother.
description.german: Gewinne eine Schlacht gegen deinen eigenen Bruder.
description.french: Sois le vainqueur d'une lutte contre ton propre frère.
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia contro tuo fratello.
description.spanish: Gana en una batalla contra tu propio hermano.
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha contra seu irmão.

description.english: Forgive your ultimate enemy as a priestess.
description.german: Vergib als Priesterin deinem ultimativen Feind.
description.french: Pardonne ton ennemi suprême comme prêtresse.
description.italian: Perdona l’ultimo nemico come sacerdotessa.
description.spanish: Perdona a tu mayor enemigo como sacerdotisa.
description.russian: Будучи жрицей, простите своего главного врага.
description.brazilian: Como sacerdotisa, perdoe seu arqui-inimigo.

description.english: Complete the game as quadruplets.
description.german: Schließt das Spiel in einem Viererteam ab.
description.french: Complète le jeu en quadruple.
description.italian: Completa il gioco come quattro gemelli.
description.spanish: Completa el juego como cuatrillizos.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo como quadrigêmeos.

description.english: Complete the game as yin and yang together.
description.german: Schließt das Spiel als Yin und Yang zusammen ab.
description.french: Complète le jeu ensemble, tel le yin et le yang.
description.italian: Completa il gioco come yin e yang insieme.
description.spanish: Completa el juego como yin y yang juntos.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo como yin e yang juntos.

description.english: Learn how to talk to animals from a witch's cat.
description.german: Lerne von der Katze einer Hexe, mit Tieren zu sprechen.
description.french: Un chapeau de sorcière t'enseignera l'art de parler aux animaux.
description.italian: Impara a parlare con gli animali dal gatto di una strega.
description.spanish: Aprende del gato de una bruja a hablar con los animales.
description.russian: Научитесь говорить с животными у ведьминского кота.
description.brazilian: Aprenda com o gato da bruxa a falar com os animais.

description.english: Learn how to talk to spirits by journeying in the afterworld.
description.german: Reise ins Jenseits und lerne, mit Geistern zu sprechen.
description.french: Voyages dans l'au-delà pour apprendre à parler aux esprits.
description.italian: Impara a parlare con gli spiriti viaggiando nell’aldilà.
description.spanish: Aprende, viajando por el más allá, a hablar con los espíritus.
description.russian: Научитесь говорить с духами, спустившись в загробный мир.
description.brazilian: Aprenda a falar com os espíritos nas suas viagens ao Além.

description.english: Convince the Sun Cultist to join you.
description.german: Überzeuge den Sonnenkultisten, dich zu unterstützen.
description.french: Convaincs le Cultiste du soleil de se joindre à toi.
description.italian: Convinci il seguace del Sole a unirsi a te.
description.spanish: Convence al Cultista Solar para que se una a ti.
description.russian: Переманите культиста Солнца на свою сторону.
description.brazilian: Convença o Devoto do Sol a ficar do seu lado.

description.english: Convince the Songweaver to join you.
description.german: Überzeuge die Liedweberin, dich zu unterstützen.
description.french: Convaincs le tisseur de chansons de se joindre à toi.
description.italian: Convinci la Cantastorie a unirsi a te.
description.spanish: Convence a la Cantora Lunar para que se una a ti.
description.brazilian: Convença a Musa a ficar do seu lado.

description.english: Convince a gryphon to join you.
description.german: Überzeuge einen Greif, dich zu unterstützen.
description.french: Convaincs le griffon de se joindre à toi.
description.italian: Convinci un grifone a unirsi a te.
description.spanish: Convence a un grifo para que se una a ti.
description.brazilian: Convença o Grifo a ficar do seu lado.

description.english: Borrow Frigga's boar.
description.german: Leih dir Friggas Wildschwein aus.
description.french: Emprunte le sanglier de Frigga.
description.italian: Prendi in prestito il cinghiale di Frigga.
description.spanish: Toma prestado el jabalí de Frigga.
description.brazilian: Pegue o javali de Frigga.

description.english: Make friends with a man that has no tribe.
description.german: Freunde dich mit einem stammeslosen Mann an.
description.french: Deviens l’ami d’un homme sans clan.
description.italian: Fai amicizia con un uomo che non ha tribù.
description.spanish: Entabla amistad con un hombre que no tiene tribu.
description.russian: Подружитесь с человеком, у которого нет племени.
description.brazilian: Fique amigo de um homem sem tribo.

description.english: Dance with a maenad of the mountains.
description.german: Tanze mit einer Mänade der Berge.
description.french: Danse avec une ménade des montagnes.
description.italian: Danza con una menade delle montagne.
description.spanish: Baila con una ménade de las montañas.
description.brazilian: Dance com a ménade da montanha.

description.english: Meet the wind spirit of the mountains.
description.german: Lerne den Windgeist der Berge kennen.
description.french: Rencontre l’esprit du vent des montagnes.
description.italian: Incontra lo spirit del vento delle montagne.
description.spanish: Conoce al espíritu del viento de las montañas.
description.brazilian: Encontre o espírito do vento da montanha.

description.english: Delve into a Sun Cultist ziggurat.
description.german: Erkunde eine Zikkurat des Sonnenkults.
description.french: Plonge dans le ziggourat du Cultiste du soleil.
description.italian: Esplora uno ziggurat della Setta del Sole.
description.spanish: Investiga un ziggurat del Culto del Sol.
description.brazilian: Examine o zigurate do Devoto do Sol.

description.english: Entertain a young admirer at your campfire.
description.german: Beeindrucke ein Kind mit deiner Tapferkeit.
description.french: Impressionne un enfant avec ta bravoure.
description.italian: Impressiona un bambino con il tuo coraggio.
description.spanish: Impresiona a un niño con tu valentía.
description.brazilian: impressione uma criança com sua coragem.

description.english: Suffer the wrath of the River Queen.
description.german: Erlebe den Zorn der Flusskönigin.
description.french: La colère de la Reine de la rivière vous engouffre.
description.italian: Subisci l’ira della Regina del Fiume.
description.spanish: Sufre la ira de la Reina del Río.
description.brazilian: Sofra a cólera da Rainha do rio.

description.english: Pray with Kubele to the Queen of Heaven.
description.german: Bete mit Kubele zur Flusskönigin.
description.french: Avec Kubele, prie à la Reine du paradis.
description.italian: Prega la Regina dei Cieli con Kubele.
description.spanish: Reza con Kubele a la Reina del Cielo.
description.brazilian: Reze para a Rainha do Céu com Kubele.

description.english: Pray with Enkidu to the Great Mother.
description.german: Bete mit Enkidu zur Großen Mutter.
description.french: Avec Enkidu, prie à la Mère Éminente.
description.italian: Prega la Grande Madre con Enkidu.
description.spanish: Reza con Enkidu a la Gran Madre.
description.brazilian: Reze para a Grande Mãe com Enkidu.

description.english: Pray with Dumuzi to the Pale Dancer.
description.german: Bete mit Dumuzi zur Fahlen Tänzerin.
description.french: Avec Dumuzi, prie au Danseur clair.
description.italian: Prega la Danzatrice Pallida con Dumuzi.
description.spanish: Reza con Dumuzi a la Bailarina Pálida.
description.brazilian: Reze para a Dançarina Pálida com Dumuzi.

description.english: Pray with Enheduanna to the Silver Sister.
description.german: Bete mit Enheduanna zur Silbernen Schwester.
description.french: Pray with Enheduanna to the Silver Sister.
description.italian: Prega la Sorella d’Argento con Enheduanna.
description.spanish: Reza con Enheduanna a la Hermana Plateada.
description.brazilian: Reze para a Irmã Prateada com Enheduanna.

description.english: Confront the Sun Cult on their home turf.
description.german: Konfrontiere den Sonnenkult in ihrem eigenen Gebiet.
description.french: Confront the Sun Cult on their home turf.
description.italian: Affronta la Setta del Sole sul suo territorio.
description.spanish: Enfréntate al Culto del Sol en su territorio.
description.russian: Сразитесь с Культом Солнца на их территории.
description.brazilian: Enfrente a Seita do Sol no seu próprio território.

description.english: Come face to face with the Goddess as an unbeliever.
description.german: Stehe der Göttin als Ungläubiger gegenüber.
description.french: Fais face à la déesse en tant qu'incroyant.
description.italian: Trovati di fronte alla Dea come miscredente.
description.spanish: Encuéntrate cara a cara con la Diosa como no creyente.
description.russian: Сойдитесь лицом к лицу с Богиней, не будучи ее последователем.
description.brazilian: Encare a Deusa como um descrente.

description.english: Find a place for each player class in the heavens at the same time.
description.german: Finde im Himmel zeitgleich einen Ort für jede Spielerklasse.
description.french: Trouve une place au paradis pour chaque joueur, dans un même instant.
description.italian: Trova un posto per ogni classe di giocatore nei cieli allo stesso tempo.
description.spanish: Encuentra un lugar en los cielos para cada clase al mismo tiempo.
description.russian: Найдите на небесах место для всех игровых классов разом.
description.brazilian: Encontre um lugar no céu ao mesmo tempo para cada classe de jogador.

description.english: Fill the sky with all the constellations.
description.german: Fülle den Himmel mit allen Konstellationen.
description.french: Remplis le ciel avec toute les constellations.
description.italian: Riempi il cielo con tutte le costellazioni.
description.spanish: Llena el cielo con todas las constelaciones.
description.brazilian: Preencha o céu com todas as constelações.

description.english: Remember the Holy River.
description.german: Gedenke dem Heiligen Fluss.
description.french: Rappelles-toi de la Rivière sacrée.
description.italian: Ricorda il Fiume Sacro.
description.spanish: Recuerda el Río Sagrado.
description.brazilian: Lembre-se do rio sagrado.

description.english: Remember the people of the mountains.
description.german: Gedenke dem Volk der Berge.
description.french: Rappelles-toi des peuples des montagnes.
description.italian: Ricorda il popolo delle montagne.
description.spanish: Recuerda a la gente de las montañas.
description.brazilian: Lembre-se do povo da montanha.

description.english: Remember the people of the river.
description.german: Gedenke dem Volk des Flusses.
description.french: Rappelles-toi des peuples de la rivière.
description.italian: Ricorda il popolo del fiume.
description.spanish: Recuerda a la gente del río.
description.brazilian: Lembre-se do povo do rio.

description.english: Fill your cupboards.
description.german: Fülle deine Schränke.
description.french: Remplis tes armoires.
description.italian: Riempi la dispensa.
description.spanish: Llena tus alacenas.
description.brazilian: Encha seus armários.

description.english: Fill your cookbook.
description.german: Fülle dein Kochbuch.
description.french: Remplis ton livre de recettes.
description.italian: Riempi il libro delle ricette.
description.spanish: Llena tu libro de recetas.
description.brazilian: Encha seu livro de receitas.

description.english: Commune with all of your ancestors.
description.german: Kommuniziere mit all deinen Ahnen.
description.french: Partage avec tous tes ancêtres.
description.italian: Comunica con tutti i tuoi antenati.
description.spanish: Conversa con todos tus ancestros.
description.brazilian: Comungue com todos os seus ancestrais.

description.english: Finish what Gilgamesh started.
description.german: Beende, was Gilgamesch begonnen hat.
description.french: Termine ce que Gilgamesh a commencé.
description.italian: Finisci ciò che Gilgamesh ha iniziato.
description.spanish: Termina lo que Gilgamesh empezó.
description.brazilian: Termine o que Gilgamesh começou.

description.english: Defy the natural order.
description.german: Trotze der natürlichen Ordnung.
description.french: Réfute l'ordre naturel.
description.italian: Sfida l’ordine naturale.
description.spanish: Desafía el orden natural.
description.brazilian: Desafie a ordem natural.

description.english: Fill your pockets.
description.german: Fülle deine Taschen.
description.french: Remplis tes poches.
description.italian: Riempiti le tasche.
description.spanish: Llena tus bolsillos.
description.brazilian: Encha seus bolsos.

description.english: Research each aspect of the Moon Goddess.
description.german: Erforsche jeden Aspekt der Mondgöttin.
description.french: Recherche chaque aspect de la Déesse de la lune.
description.italian: Fai ricerca su ogni aspetto della Dea Lunare.
description.spanish: Investiga cada aspecto de la Diosa Lunar.
description.brazilian: Pesquise todos os aspectos da Deusa Lua.

description.english: Defeat the Sun God for all time.
Defeat Wave 20 of the Endless Arena.
Defeat Wave 30 of the Endless Arena.
Convince the Snowdancer to join you.
Use dance to save the world.
Unlock the coolest cooking ingredient.
